WorkItem.Description:
On initiliasation of the ExcelBinaryReader, a set of worksheet global information is retrieved (including the set of Sheet Names).

However it is not possible to inspect the name of the first sheet without performing a read operation first.

On investigation this is related to the initialisation of the m_SheetIndex value which is initialied to -1 and not incremented until the first read.

Note: It is possible to get the name of the first sheet without performing a read operation on the ExcelOpenXmlReader.

A patch will soon be submitted in relation to this.
WorkItem.Summary: ExcelBinaryReader - Ability to check Sheet Name before first Read() operation
